新增功能
* 增加时间后马上提醒一次。
* 超时候继续提醒（默认关闭，需要去设置打开）。
* 读秒的范围可在设置中调整。

In this huge update, we've brought you advanced timers for free. You can now name your timers, define durations and configure them with different settings.

We are in the middle of transitioning this app to a free one with paid PRO features. To be fair to the existing users, we are offering all users the opportunity to upgrade to Pro for free. We encourage all users to upgrade as soon as possible, to avoid losing access to certain features in the future.

We are in the middle of transitioning this to a free app. Some existing features will become paid features (Pro). To be fair to the existing users, we are offering everyone the opportunity to upgrade to Pro for free. Please upgrade as soon as possible to avoid losing access to certain features in the future. The upgrade option can be found in the app Settings (the 4th tab).

We have completed the transition to a free app. The basic features of this app are now free to everyone. If you need more advanced feature, please upgrade to Pro. Existing users who have paid for the app can upgrade to Pro for free.
